ability: 【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have 4 or more other Red or 《死神》 Characters, you may place the top card of your Deck into Stock.

name: トイレの花子さん
flavor_text: かつて私は…小学校のスターだった！
ability: 【A】When this card becomes REVERSE in battle, place the top card of your Deck into Clock, REST this card.

name: “霊体クラッカー”だまし神
flavor_text: ― これは霊体クラッカー。大きな音を立て、敵を撃退する死神道具だ。ちなみに、普通のクラッカーでも同じ効果が期待できるぞ ―
ability: 【S】● ASSIST 3000 Level 2 ［① Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during that turn, it gets +3000 Power)

name: “黒猫族”六文
flavor_text: ほら！おかかごはんゲットしてきました！
ability: 【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top 3 cards of your Deck into Waiting Room.
attributes: Black Cat of Contract 《契約黒猫》
